ProductInfo.Features:
Image sensor: Sony CCD, color DSP. Signal system: NTSC standard
Lens: built-in f3.6mm Lens. Horizontal resolution: 480 TVL
Digital automatic backlight compensation. Small size; discreet installation
Weatherproof housing for indoor outdoor applications
Package included: 2 x bullet cameras with swivel mounts, 2 x 12V DC power supplies and 2 x bonus security warning signs
